title: Site-directed allostery perturbation to probe the negative regulation of hypoxia inducible factor-1α
content:
RSC Chem. Biol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D4CB00066H, Paper

Vencel Petrovicz, Istvan Pasztuhov, Tamas Martinek, Zsófia Hegedüs
The interaction between the intrinsically disordered transcription factor HIF-1α and the coactivator proteins p300/CBP is essential in the fast response to low oxygenation. The negative feedback regulator, CITED2, switches off...
